settings_schema.header: The Netlify plugin for Mattermost allows users to control your netlify sites right from Mattermost
settings_schema.footer: Made with Love and Support from Mattermost Team by Md Zubair Ahmed

settings.placeholder: Please copy the same application name in Netlify OAuth app
settings.help_text: The name given to the your OAuth application in Netlify, Please remember to add the Redirect URL in Netlify application as : <siteURL>/plugins/netlify/oauth/redirect

settings.placeholder: Please copy client ID over from Netlify OAuth application
settings.help_text: The OAuth Client ID generated by Netlify for your OAuth application

settings.placeholder: Please copy secret over from Netlify OAuth application
settings.help_text: The OAuth Secret generated by Netlify for your OAuth application

settings.placeholder: Generate the key and store before connecting the account
settings.help_text: The AES encryption key internally used in plugin to encrypt stored access tokens.
